credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
title: Jug
provenance:
Jordan - Volpe Gallery, New York
Marcia and William Goodman
description: Jug or ewer consisting of a thrown red clay body. The spherical body is surmounted with a long cylindrical neck and a flaring lip. Prominent concentric ridges around body and neck, in the clay.  Squared handle applied at the shoulder on one side and small curved hook on the other.  Body decorated with three large crabs in yellow and white underglaze slip.  Suggestions of plant life in dark brown slip.  Against mahogany ground various aventurine effects in the yellow glaze.
name: Jug
